name: Monochrome (Vitasa)
description:
Monochrome is a top-down puzzle game in which you navigate through the darkness seeking fulfillment. It was made as a fun personal project. All feedback is highly appreciated.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Space Bar for Credits (In Main Menu)
  • Esc for Pause Menu

Credits:

Programming / Producing - Carl Vitasa
Art / Animation - Conrad Lee
Level Designer - Jack Burrows
